scripts.mpv-dev: node-gyp rebuild && cp build/Release/boram.node dist/app/libboram.so && cp build/Release/ffmpeg.node node_modules/electron-prebuilt/dist/libffmpeg.so
scripts.mpv-win32-prebuild: del E:\boram.node && node-gyp rebuild --arch=ia32 && copy build\Release\boram.node E:\
scripts.pack-win32: electron-packager dist/app --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --out=dist --icon=src/index/icon.ico --app-copyright='Copyright (c) 2016 T-ara Industries' --win32metadata.CompanyName='T-ara Industries' --win32metadata.FileDescription='Cross-platform WebM encoder' --win32metadata.OriginalFilename=boram.exe --win32metadata.ProductName=boram && cd dist && rm *win-x86/LICENSE* && cp -a ../legal *win-x86 && 7z a -m0=lzma2 -mx=9 $(echo *win-x86).7z *win-x86
scripts.pack-win64: cd dist && D=$(echo *win-x86) && cp -a *win-x86 ${D%??}64 && rm -rf *win-x64/resources/app && cp -a app *win-x64/resources && 7z a -m0=lzma2 -mx=9 $(echo *win-x64).7z *win-x64
scripts.pack-lin64: electron-packager dist/app --platform=linux --arch=x64 --out=dist && cd dist && rm *linux-x64/LICENSE* && cp -a ../legal *linux-x64 && strip ../build/Release/ffmpeg.node -o *linux-x64/libffmpeg.so && 7z a -m0=lzma2 -mx=9 $(echo *linux-x64).7z *linux-x64
scripts.release-win32: rm -rf dist/*win-x86* && BORAM_PLATFORM=win32 npm run app && npm run mpv-win32 && npm run pack-win32
scripts.release-win64: rm -rf dist/*win-x64* && BORAM_PLATFORM=win64 npm run app && npm run mpv-win32 && npm run pack-win64
scripts.release-lin64: rm -rf dist/*linux-x64* && BORAM_PLATFORM=lin64 npm run app && npm run mpv-lin64 && npm run pack-lin64
scripts.release: rm -rf dist && npm run release-win32 && npm run release-win64 && npm run release-lin64
scripts.binaries: rm -rf bin && mkdir bin && cd bin && wget https://yt-dl.org/latest/youtube-dl -O youtube-dl.zip && wget https://yt-dl.org/latest/youtube-dl.exe && wget https://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/win32/shared/ffmpeg-latest-win32-shared.7z && 7z x ffmpeg-latest-win32-shared.7z && wget https://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/win64/shared/ffmpeg-latest-win64-shared.7z && 7z x ffmpeg-latest-win64-shared.7z && wget https://mpv.srsfckn.biz/mpv-dev-latest.7z && 7z x mpv-dev-latest.7z
